Interface DSCAPS


  • public interface DSCAPS

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DSCAPS_CERTIFIED
      device driver has been certified by Microsoft
      static int DSCAPS_CONTINUOUSRATE
      supports all sample rates between min/maxrate
      static int DSCAPS_EMULDRIVER
      device does NOT have hardware DirectSound support

      16 bit
      static int DSCAPS_SECONDARY8BIT
      8 bit
      static int DSCAPS_SECONDARYMONO
      mono

      stereo
